categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Breerdin was a Human male who served as an officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Intelligence agency during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic.

Stationed on Balmorra, Breerdin tasked an Imperial-aligned individual to help him stop an incident between the Empire and the Chiss. The individual was sent by the officer to plant evidence in the cantina's security system to implicate the Balmorran resistance's involvement.
